Description: Hondo Black Right Handed Electric Guitar 715 Series from the 1990s This Hondo Black Right Handed Electric Guitar 715 Series from the 1990s is in very good condition. I bought this electric guitar for my husband who wanted to learn guitar in the 1990s. He proudly displayed the guitar on the stand but never took a lesson or played it. It was played once by someone else who came to the house. After 20 plus years, I have decided he will never take lessons. This guitar should be played by some one who enjoys creating music. I do NOT have a soft or hard case for the guitar. The guitar stand shown in the photos is NOT included with the guitar. You will receive the guitar and shoulder strap only. Please ask any and all questions. Title: Hondo Black Right Handed Electric Guitar 715 Series from the 1990s
